content:
on behalf of the CCAI Summer School organizing committee

The virtual Climate Change AI Summer School 2023 starts on Friday, Jun 23rd! Over the course of the next few weeks, we will have experts deliver lectures & tutorials on many topics at the intersection of AI and climate change.

The virtual summer school is free to attend and open-to-all!

Dates: Between June 23-July 27, 2023 (schedule on CCAI website)
Full Program: https://www.climatechange.ai/events/summer_school
Registration link: https://www.climatechange.ai/summer_school_virtual
